casebody.data:
ABCON ASSOCIATES, INC., Plaintiff-Cross Appellant, v. UNITED STATES, Defendant-Appellant. Nos. 01-5149, 02-5005. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Dec. 4, 2002.

Before RADER, Circuit Judge, ARCHER, Senior Circuit Judge, and GAJARSA, Circuit Judge.

*511JUDGMENT

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
